name: Fireboy&Watergirl Runner
description:
This game was made for Untitled Game Jam #29.

Just my thoughts about different point of view on Fireboy&Watergirl game .  Some mixture of Fireboy&Watergirl idea , side view runner and them of this Jam "Transformation".

Controles:
Space -> Switch between characters
Arrows -> Move 
2xOn top arrow ->Double jump
